attributes.action: Stop state funding of Abortion (outside of rape, risk to the mothers health or incest)
attributes.additional_details:
The people of Britian deserve to have their freedom of conscience protected via prohibiting the use of tax payers funds to carry out abortions.

This isnt about being pro-life or pro-choice. The right of a women to have an abortion is an important one, in cases of rape, health risk or incest. After that forcing taxpayers to pay for abortions is a disgrace, beyond the fact many people find it moral abhorent one must consider peoples religious belief's.
